extendedInfo.description: Difficult to improve the ranking? Do you want to know which hero will be better in your game?Have there been a hero of your choice to being countered, then lost the game?There have been someone tell you which hero is better in the game, but you haven't this hero?Have there been choose the Teemo kill Singed in top lane, but still lost the game?Don't know how to play in early fighting, because you don't understand status of each lane?When you need gank, which lane is high efficiency?When you are watching the game, do you want to analyze the game?This is the Personal winner system, which can mainly be to win at the starting point.1. You can play more smoothly in rank.2. Suggest a best hero in the game.3. Lets you always easy to win the lane4. Personalize design, you can set good hero or purchase, suggest more meaningful.5. This system not only analyzes counter value, but also analyzes the two sides team6. Regardless of the hero's number of our and opponent, the system can still suggest in the game the best hero.7. Let you understand status of each lane, you can control the game.8. Understand which lane can be gank.9.When you watching game, the system can analyze the gameImages and graphics used in this app are property of their respective owners. League of Legends Â© 2010-2012 Riot Games Inc. All rights reserved.Reference website : 1. LOL : http://na.leagueoflegends.com/1. News Of Legends : http://www.championselect.net/Champions2. Lol Counter : http://www.lolcounter.com/championsThank you for Anri Khakhiashvilli. Thanks for help me to translate. Very thank you.Keyword : LOL, personal, rank, select hero, counter, team analysis, early fighting, gank

reviews.title: Well executed
reviews.comment: The app is great, easy to use and very comfortable, though you could add some features : Tag system that will give information about damage type (magic/physical/mixed) area of effect (single target/AoE) and amount of cc divided to soft and hard cc. Another great thing would be the addition of synergy list (champions who work well together such as orianna and malphite due to their ultimate combination)
reviews.author: Anri Khakhiashvilli

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: The counters are picked wisely,good job.
reviews.author: Denis Mita

reviews.title: Not many apps like this
reviews.comment: Nice app,keep up the good work

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good in content but poor English
